title: Singing Forest Birds
description: The sounds for the sample pack "Singing Forest Birds" were recorded in the forest and on the outskirts of the village.
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO

Here you will hear looped sounds of the noise of the summer forest and the singing of forest birds.

With the help of these sounds you can create a forest atmosphere for games, films and cartoons.


"Singing Forest Birds" includes:

  • Birds Trilling and Forest Noise
  • Birds Trilling on Outskirts of Village
  • Forest Birds
  • Someone Walked Past In The Forest
  • Bonus

Addition - Forest Stream Loops:

This small sound pack includes 11 stream loops recorded in the forest.

With these sounds you will create a realistic atmosphere of presence in the forest by the stream.

Singing Forest Birds - Sound List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 81

Number of Audio Cues: 81

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 80 min

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
